title: Corrie's Nikki Sanderson back on cobbles after 14 years to celebrate Sue Nicholls' anniversary
text:

Coronation Street star Nikki Sanderson made a return to the cobbles 14 years after her exit.

The actress, who played hairdresser Candice Stowe, headed to the salon to surprise Sue Nicholls , who plays her former employer Audrey Roberts.

Soap legend Sue is celebrating 40 years in the role, and Nikki returned alongside Tracy Shaw, who played fellow salon worker Maxine Peacock, to surprise Sue, 75.

In a special episode on Monday night that looked back on her time in Weatherfield, Sue was seen standing outside her character's salon, where unbeknown to her, Nikki, 35, and 46-year-old Tracy were hiding inside.

Sue got a huge shock when she turned around to see the pair running up behind her.

(Image: ITV CHANNEL4)

(Image: Dave Benett/Getty Images for The)

She let out a joyful scream before embracing them both in a big hug, before they went back in the salon to look back on the good times they shared there.

Sue shouted: "Oh my god, oh my god, I was just about to mention you. Oh, I'm going to cry, it's too much."

Nikki joined the show in 1999 as Sarah Platt's chain-smoking school pal, and remained until 2005.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: Granada Television)

Her character provided plenty of drama, with Candice dating brothers Todd and Jason Grimshaw and having a fling with Sarah's big brother Nick Tilsley.

She also had romances with married shampoo salesman Tim Marsden and footballer Warren Baldwin during her time on the cobbles.

Candice ended up leaving the show after she fixed the hair of members of rock band Status Quo at Les and Cilla Battersby's wedding.

(Image: ITV CHANNEL4)

(Image: Unknown)

They were so impressed with her work that they offered her a job and she fled the cobbles.

She went on to star in Holby City, Cold Blood, and Heartbeat, amongst many other shows, but is perhaps best known for her role as Maxine Minniver in Hollyoaks, which she joined in 2012.

Tracy starred in Corrie from 1995 to 2003, and married butcher Ashley Peacock.

(Image: David Fisher/ITV/REX)

She was brutally murdered by evil Richard Hillman, leaving Ashley devastated when he discovered her body.
